source.author: Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Primulaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: Modified from: Walsh, N.G. (1996). Primulaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves thickish, less than 1 cm wide (rarely rosette leaves wider); inflorescence corymbose or flowers scattered and solitary in axils, leafy growth often continuing beyond inflorescence; bract basal to pedicel; mostly saline areas
Leaves membranous, 1 cm wide or more; inflorescence a terminal raceme; bract inserted c. midway along pedicel; moist, usually riparian sites in the east
